title: How to Paint Festive Penguin
description:
In this Warhammer Painting video, we're going to show you how to turn a Beasts of Chaos Herdstone into a festive penguin! The perfect monument to offer up presents for the Dark Gods this Squigmas! 

If you're new to painting - check out our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials videos to learn all about it: http://warhammer.me/3Vkojs6
